title: Why didn't i get the free Kayle skin
body: I didn't get the free skin but i did get the icon

replies.body: OK thanks i see it now. But when I was in the champions and clicked Kayle it didn't show the skin at all
It looks like you received Riot Kayle's skin pretty early on in the waves that went out. If you're having trouble using the skin, please let me know.
